title: game crashes at loading screen
body: every time i  join a game since the last update a couple of days ago as soon as it goes to the loading screen after champ select i get the league of legends client has stopped working message and the game closes down. no matter how many times i try and re connect i get the same thing. i have all ready ran the repair tool a few times and it didn't change anything. Help please

replies.body: Hmmmm it sounds like some of those game files were damaged or weren't updated properly. I'd suggest grabbing the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and having it run as admin to do a  **reinstall and clean uninstall**.
tried this a couple times now unfortunately has not fixed it. any other possible fixes?
